title: Indo-Lanka Accord and the Punjab Accord – India fooled Sikhs and is now fooling Tamils
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – The comparisons are hard to miss. While mother Indira Gandhi created both Bhindrawale and Prabakaran, mother was killed by her Sikh bodyguards and son was blown to bits by Prabakaran, both Sikhs and Tamils have been demanding a separate Homeland.
